txt_en: The best state of life is to be stupid.
txt_cn: 生活最好的状态就是随心所“愚”。

txt_en: When things are looking down, look up.
txt_cn: 当一切都在走下坡时，要向上看。

txt_en: Part of life is learning to let things go.
txt_cn: 学会放手也是人生的一部分。

txt_en: Sharp tools make good work.
txt_cn: 工欲善其事，必先利其器。

txt_en: You're always on my mind.
txt_cn: 你长眠，我常念。

txt_en: Work makes the workman.
txt_cn: 勤工出巧匠。

txt_en: It's never too late to right past wrongs.
txt_cn: 弥补过去的罪过，何时都不算晚。

txt_en: When all else is lost, the future still remains.
txt_cn: 就算失去了一切别的东西，也还有未来。

txt_en: Never underestimate your power to change yourself!
txt_cn: 永远不要低估你改变自我的能力！

txt_en: Nothing for nothing.
txt_cn: 不费力气，一无所得。

txt_en: Easy doesn't enter into grown-up life.
txt_cn: 成年人的生活里没有容易二字。

txt_en: I will greet this day with love in my heart.
txt_cn: 我要用全身心的爱来迎接今天。

txt_en: Do what you say, and say what you do.
txt_cn: 做你说过的，说你能做的。

txt_en: There is no short cut in learning.
txt_cn: 学习没有捷径可走。

txt_en: Art is long, life is short.
txt_cn: 知识无穷，生命有限。

txt_en: The more we study, the more we discover our ignorance.
txt_cn: 学然后知不足。

txt_en: He who laughs last laughs best.
txt_cn: 笑到最后才笑得最好。

txt_en: Perseverance can make miracles happen.
txt_cn: 坚持就有奇迹。

txt_en: Rainbow comes after a storm.
txt_cn: 风雨过后总见彩虹。

txt_en: Youth means limitless possibilities.
txt_cn: 年轻就是无限的可能。

txt_en: Pursue breakthroughs in your life.
txt_cn: 追求你生活中的突破。

txt_en: Everyday and in every way I'm getting better.
txt_cn: 每天每个方面我的生活都在逐渐好转。

txt_en: All things come to those who wait.
txt_cn: 坚持到底，就是胜利。

txt_en: A fool will fool himself, but time will not fool anyone.
txt_cn: 愚人终会愚己，时间却不会愚弄任何人。

txt_en: Every obstacle is an opportunity.
txt_cn: 每个障碍也是一个机会。

txt_en: You mustn't be afraid to dream a little bigger!
txt_cn: 怕什么？做梦就做的大一点儿！

txt_en: Out with the old, in with the new.
txt_cn: 旧的不去，新的不来。

txt_en: Compromise where you can. Where you can't, don't.
txt_cn: 能迁就处可妥协，该坚守时不退让

txt_en: Winner makes the rules, and losers live by them.
txt_cn: 成王败寇。
